title: Constructive Rivalry
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Phew, it’s too hot to practice on the roof today....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>With this much sunlight, there’s probably a chance we’ll get sunburnt. So I guess we should wrap up today’s independent training here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Yeah, thanks for today, Karin. I’ll start doing the stretches you taught me immediately today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Sure. It’s important to keep doing them every day, so by all means, go for it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Of course! Nico will spare no effort to become an even more perfect school idol than ever.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, that’s the spirit! I really enjoy talking to you too, Nico-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>? Was there anything fun in our conversation just now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>This obviously also goes for everyone at Nijigaku, but it means that, to me, you’re a good rival to work hard together with, Nico-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Then you basically gave your enemy a helping hand with today’s practice, huh? I can’t believe you taught me everything about the stretches.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Don’t worry, because I’ll also steal your techniques next time, Nico-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
